name: KR Farms
description: We are amongst the prominent firm in the
overview:
K.R. Farms a leading name in the industry that came into existence in the year 2004. Our company is working as a sole proprietorship firm in the industry. We have appointed a sound and expert team skilled people, in order to ensure that each and every activity gets performed in the well managed way. We have around 50 lakh to 1 crore turnover annually. Our company is engaged in Cultivation of Fresh Grapes, Onions, Bananas, Tomatoes, Coconut Byproducts, Green Coconuts & Turmeric Fingers. All the products offered by us are quality based as they are checked by our quality controllers once they are ready to serve in the market.

Infrastructure: As it is conspicuous that infrastructure plays a vital role in the success of any organization, we have our own in Coimbatore Tamil Nadu. We have all the modern machinery and tools that help in completing the task of packaging of our range on time. We have a special department that has control over the other department so that the chances of mistakes can be zero.

Our Team: A company without a team is incomplete as it is the team that works for an organization. We have appointed a well qualified and experienced to perform all the tasks of the organization. They are enough motivated to complete their work on time and with the maximum accuracy. In order to support the team members we regularly keep on conducting seminars and award functions so that they can keep themselves motivated and work to achieve the organizational goal.

Our Quality Assurance: Quality always comes first for us. We have set our quality parameters and work according to that so that we can serve our customers with the best. We have an expert team that is well acquainted with all the parameters and keep on controlling the activities of the organization related to the quality issues. We do not comprise in the matter of quality.

Our Product Range: Our company is engaged in Cultivation of Fresh Grapes, Onions, Bananas, Tomatoes, Coconut Byproducts, Green Coconuts & Turmeric Fingers.
